original_text: His bones are as strong pieces of brass; his bones are like bars of iron.
korean_text: 그 뼈는 놋관 같고 그 뼈대는 쇠 막대기 같으니

sentences.original_text: His bones are as strong pieces of brass
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 뼈는 강한 놋쇠 조각과 같으며

sentences.original_text: his bones are like bars of iron
